channel.title: Adding [474] Maps [PI]
channel.description:
Hey so I am trying to follow this tutorial: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/386611-317-adding-correct-full-474-maps.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/386611-317-adding-correct-full-474-maps.html[/url]
I get no errors compiling but when I run the client I get these errors:
[QUOTE]PANIC! RANDOMISED BLOCK! Map Amount: 770 Error: loaderror Requesting maps 150 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10757 at OnDemandFetcher.method563(OnDemandFetcher.java:486) at OnDemandFetcher.method554(OnDemandFetcher.java:209) at client.startUp(client.java:8107) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:62) at client.run(client.java:5016) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/QUOTE]
Help plox?
Thanks, Jokerrr

item.title: Adding [474] Maps [PI]
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

I don’t believe this was completely meant for PI’s

item.title: Adding [474] Maps [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Hey so I am trying to follow this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/386611-317-adding-correct-full-474-maps.html

I get no errors compiling but when I run the client I get these errors:

[QUOTE]PANIC! RANDOMISED BLOCK!
Map Amount: 770
Error: loaderror Requesting maps 150
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10757
at OnDemandFetcher.method563(OnDemandFetcher.java:486)
at OnDemandFetcher.method554(OnDemandFetcher.java:209)
at client.startUp(client.java:8107)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:62)
at client.run(client.java:5016)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/QUOTE]

Help plox?

Thanks, Jokerrr
